remarks: An undirected simple graph is complete if and only if each vertex is a universal vertex.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Oct-2017.)  (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Jan-2018.)
statement: cusgrauvtxb $p |- ( V USGrph E -> ( V ComplUSGrph E <-> ( V UnivVertex E ) = V ) ) $.
